parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: ChargeType
parameters.description:
The billing method.

Valid values:

*   PREPAY

    <!-- -->

    :

    <!-- -->

    the subscription billing method

    <!-- -->

*   POSTPAY

    <!-- -->

    :

    <!-- -->

    the pay-as-you-go billing method

    <!-- -->

parameters.name: ClusterSpecification
parameters.description:
The engine specifications. Valid values:

\[Professional Edition]

*   `MSE_SC_2_4_60_c`: 2 vCPUs and 4 GB of memory
*   `MSE_SC_1_2_60_c`: 1 vCPU and 2 GB of memory
*   `MSE_SC_4_8_60_c`: 4 vCPUs and 8 GB of memory
*   `MSE_SC_8_16_60_c`: 8 vCPUs and 16 GB of memory
*   `MSE_SC_16_32_60_c`: 16 vCPUs and 32 GB of memory

\[Developer Edition]

*   `MSE_SC_1_2_60_c`: 1 vCPU and 2 GB of memory
*   `MSE_SC_2_4_60_c`: 2 vCPUs and 4 GB of memory

parameters.name: ClusterType
parameters.description: The type of the instance. Valid values: ZooKeeper and Nacos-Ans.

parameters.name: ClusterVersion
parameters.description:
The engine version of the instance. Valid values:

\[Professional version]

*   `NACOS_2_0_0`: Nacos 2.0.0
*   `ZooKeeper_3_8_0`: ZooKeeper 3.8.0

\[Developer Edition]

*   `NACOS_2_0_0`: Nacos 2.0.0
*   `ZooKeeper_3_8_0`: ZooKeeper 3.8.0

parameters.name: ConnectionType
parameters.description:
The network connection type. Valid values:

*   slb
*   eni

parameters.name: DiskType
parameters.description:
The type of the disk. Valid values:

*   alicloud-disk-ssd
*   alicloud-disk-essd-pl1

parameters.name: EipEnabled
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable Internet access (Elastic IP Address) if ConnectionType is set to `single_eni`.

parameters.name: InstanceCount
parameters.description:
The number of nodes in the instance. Valid values: 1 to 9.

\[Professional Edition]

*   The number of nodes in an instance is greater than or equal to 3 and must be an odd number.

\[Developer Edition]

*   Only one node can be deployed for an instance.

parameters.name: InstanceName
parameters.description: The name of the MSE instance.

parameters.name: MseVersion
parameters.description:
Configure this parameter unless otherwise specified. Valid values:

*   `mse_pro`: Professional Edition
*   `mse_dev`: Developer Edition.

parameters.name: NetType
parameters.description:
The network type of the MSE instance. Valid values:

*   `privatenet`: VPC
*   `pubnet`: Internet

parameters.name: PrivateSlbSpecification
parameters.description:
The specifications of the internal-facing SLB instance. Valid values:

*   `slb.s1.small`
*   `slb.s3.medium`

parameters.name: PubNetworkFlow
parameters.description:
The public bandwidth. Unit: Mbit/s. This parameter is required.\
Valid values: 0 to 5000. A value of 0 indicates no access to the Internet.

parameters.name: PubSlbSpecification
parameters.description:
The specifications of the Internet-facing Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance. Valid values:

*   `slb.s1.small`
*   `slb.s3.medium`

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description:
The region where the instance resides. Examples:

*   `cn-hangzhou`: China (Hangzhou)
*   `cn-beijing`: China (Beijing)
*   `cn-shanghai`: China (Shanghai)
*   `cn-zhangjiakou`: China (Zhangjiakou)
*   `cn-shenzhen`: China (Shenzhen)

parameters.name: RequestPars
parameters.description: The extended request parameters in the JSON format.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group. For the details of resource groups, see [View basic information of a resource group](~~457230~~).

parameters.name: SecurityGroupType
parameters.description:
The type of the security group to which the instance belongs. This parameter is valid only when the ConnectionType parameter is set to `single_eni`.

Valid values:

*   enterprise
*   normal

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The list of the tags that you want to add.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC).
